location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Thomas White, Paymaster-General at Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Thomas White, Paymaster-General at Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of a letter sent on 1 May and informing him that a payment of twenty-four Rupees for supplies to Indian [Hindoo] Sepoys was made.
